quotes: received a Ph.D. in engineering from Keio in 1974.
spent some years as the Dean of Keio’s School of Science and Technology (1993-2001).
He then became the President of Keio University (2001-09).
He was the President at JSPS (2011-18).
in 2018 he submitted a dissertation on the relationship between cognitive science and epistemology to Keio University, and received a Ph.D. in philosophy.
He has been working on human and machine learning, and human-robot-computer interaction for over 40 years.
